titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of the week of April 11 through April 15, 2016, as "National Assistant Principals Week".
A resolution expressing support for the designation of the week of April 11 through April 15, 2016, as "National Assistant Principals Week".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Supports the designation of April 11-April 15, 2016, as National Assistant Principals Week.
Honors the contributions of assistant principals to students' success.
